section.p: You are swept away by the current and eventually carried back to the bank. By this time you are bruised and weary and you have got several mouthfuls of foul muddy water.

Lose 2 Stamina points. Also, unless you have a blessing of Immunity to Disease/Poison, you become sick with malaria and must permanently
lose 1 from all your attributes
except SANCTITY.
(Remember to cross off the blessing if you had one.)
